name: How to Make a Discord Bot with discord.js
description:
Announcing the Coding Train discord! http://thecodingtrain.com/discord. Come and join the community to meet viewers, share pictures of your pets, and get help with your code!

This series will teach you how to code your very first Discord bot with node.js and discord.js.

content.title: Discord Bots 1: Introduction
content.description: Introducing a new series: How to Make a Discord bot! This video covers the tools I plan to use to create and code a Discord bot.

content.title: Discord Bots 2: Discord Developer Portal
content.description: In this video I demonstrate how use the discord developer portal to create a bot application and add it to a specific discord server using the client id.

content.title: Discord Bots 3: Coding a Bot with discord.js
content.description: It's finally time to write some code! In this video, I demonstrate the very basics of coding a 'hello world'-style bot with discord.js.

content.title: Discord Bots 4: Hiding API Keys with .env
content.description: In this video I demonstrate how to use the node dotenv package along with a .env file to store (and hide!) API keys outside of the source code.

content.title: Discord Bots 5: Posting GIFs
content.description: In this video, I demonstrate how to post GIFs to Discord from a bot.

content.title: Discord Bots 5: Posting GIFs
content.description: In this video I demonstrate how to manage multiple Discord bot commands with 'a command handler' built with CommonJS and require() in node.js.ðŸ’»

content.title: A Comprehensive Review on Bot - Discord Bot
